List of research articles citing EntropyHub
###########################################


2024
----

* `2-D Threshold Hyperchaotic Map and Application in Timed One-Time Password <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10614840>`_
    | H Bao, et al.
    | *IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics*

* `Capacity configuration of cascaded hydro-wind-photovoltaic complementary systems considering comprehensive benefits based on a synergetic-orderly framework <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.enconman.2024.118916>`_
    | Y Cui, et al. 
    | *Energy Conversion and Management*

* `Entropy-based feature selection for capturing impacts in Earth system models with extreme forcing <https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.18011>`_
    | J Watkins, Jerry, et al.
    | *arXiv*

* `FateNet: an integration of dynamical systems and deep learning for cell fate prediction <https://academic.oup.com/bioinformatics/article/40/9/btae525/7739702>`_
    | M Sadria, T.M. Bury
    | *Bioinformatics*

* `Quantifying the randomness and scale invariance of the repeating fast radio bursts <https://doi.org/10.1093/mnras/stae1873>`_
    | Yu Sang, Hai-Nan Lin
    | *Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society*

* `Exploring the Real-Time Variability and Complexity of Sitting Patterns in Office Workers with Non-Specific Chronic Spinal Pain and Pain-Free Individuals <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/24/14/4750>`_
    | Eduarda Oliosi, Afonso Júlio, Phillip Probst, Luís Silva, João Paulo Vilas-Boas, Ana Rita Pinheiro, Hugo Gamboa
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*

* `Disruption of neural periodicity predicts clinical response after deep brain stimulation for obsessive-compulsive disorder <https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-024-03125-0>`_
    | Provenza NR, Reddy S, Allam AK et al. 
    | *Nature Medicine*

* `Maloperation of Zone-3 Distance Relay Prevention Using Distribution Entropy <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10584515>`_
    | U. Mukundarajan, K. Shanti Swarup
    | *IEEE Access*

* `ComplexityMeasures.jl: scalable software to unify and accelerate entropy and complexity timeseries analysis <https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.05011>`_ 
    | George Datseris, Kristian Agasøster Haaga
    | *arXiv*

* `Using EEG to advance mindfulness science: A survey of emerging methods and approaches <https://osf.io/preprints/psyarxiv/v3ny8>`_
    | Yanli Lin, Daniel Andrew Atad, Anthony P. Zanesco
    | *PsyArXiv*

* `Effect of interhemispheric zero-phase entrainment of the intrinsic mu-rhythm on behavioral and neural markers of predictive coding <https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.05.07.592996v1>`_
    | Kirstin-Friederike Heise, Geneviève Albouy, Nina Dolfen, Ronald Peeters, Dante Mantini, Stephan P. Swinnen
    | *BioRxiv*

* `The Temporal Dimension of Consciousness: exploring Intrinsic Neural Timescales (INTs) and their role as a facilitator of consciousness <https://www.research.unipd.it/handle/11577/3513504>`_    
    | Andrea Buccellato
    | *University of Padua Archive*

* `Diverging functional connectivity timescales: Capturing distinct aspects of cognitive performance in early psychosis <https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.05.07.24306932v1>`_
    | Fabian Hirsch, Ângelo Bumanglag, Yifei Zhang, Afra Wohlschlaeger
    | *MedrXiv*

* `Extracting Stress-Related EEG Patterns from Pre-Sleep EEG for Forecasting Slow-Wave Sleep Deficiency <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10510041>`_
    | Cheng-Hua Su, Li-Wei Ko, Tzyy-Ping Jung, Julie Onton, Shey-Cherng Tzou, Jia-chi Juang, Chung-Yao Hsu,
    | *IEEE Transactions on Neural Systems and Rehabilitation Engineering*

* `Radiological complexity of nuclear facilities: an information complexity approach to workplace monitoring <https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1361-6498/ad42a5/meta>`_
    | Abinash Chakraborty, Neeraj Parashar, Dhananjay Kumar Pandey, Pankaj Kumar, UV Deokar, JPN Pandey, MS Kulkarni
    | *Journal of Radiological Protection*

* `From physiological complexity to data interactions—A case study of recordings from exercise monitoring <https://pubs.aip.org/aip/cha/article/34/4/043136/3282829/From-physiological-complexity-to-data-interactions>`_
    | Małgorzata Andrzejewska, Tomasz Wróblewski, Szymon Cygan, Mateusz Ozimek, Monika Petelczyc
    | *Chaos*

* `Predictability and Complexity of Fine and Gross Motor Skills in Fibromyalgia Patients: A Pilot Study <https://www.mdpi.com/2075-4663/12/4/90#>`_
    | Nancy Brígida, David Catela, Cristiana Mercê, Marco Branco
    | *Sports (MDPI)*

* `Exploring the Entropy-Based Classification of Time Series Using Visibility Graphs from Chaotic Maps <https://www.mdpi.com/2227-7390/12/7/938>`_
    | J. Alberto Conejero, Andrei Velichko, Òscar Garibo-i-Orts, Yuriy Izotov, Viet-Thanh Pham 
    | *Mathematics (MDPI)*

* `Monitoring chaos at the cot-side <https://www.nature.com/articles/s41390-024-03151-1>`_
    | Michael J. Beacom, Martin G. Frasch, Christopher A. Lear, Alistair J. Gunn
    | *Pediatric Research*

* `Recognition of map activities using eye tracking and EEG data <https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/13658816.2024.2309188>`_
    | Tong Qin, Wim Fias, Nico Van de Weghe, Haosheng Huang
    | *International Journal of Geographical Information Science*

* `Approximate entropy analysis for nonlinear beam dynamics <https://journals.aps.org/prab/abstract/10.1103/PhysRevAccelBeams.27.011601>`_
    | Yongjun Li, Robert Rainer
    | *Physical Reviews Accelerators and Beams*

* `What can entropy metrics tell us about the characteristics of ocular fixation trajectories? <https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0291823>`_
    | Kateryna Melnyk, Lee Friedman, Oleg V. Komogortsev
    | *PLoS One*


2023
----

* `Nonlinear Analysis of the Dynamical Characteristics of EEG Signals in Epileptic Brains <https://mhnursing.or.kr/index.php/JKPMHN/article/view/153>`_
    | Shervin Skaria, Sreelatha KS
    | *Journal of the Korean Academy of Pyschiatric and Mental Health Nursing*

* `NLDyn - An open source MATLAB toolbox for the univariate and multivariate nonlinear dynamical analysis of physiological data <https://www.doi.org/10.1016/j.cmpb.2023.107941>`_
    | Mostafa Rostaghi, Sadegh Rostaghi, Anne Humeau-Heurtier, Tarek K. Rajji, Hamed Azami
    | *Computer Methods and Programs in Biomedicine*

* `Functional near-infrared spectroscopy for human brain age group classification by machine learning <https://doi.org/10.22541/au.170004063.32719671/v1>`_
    | Martti Ilvesmäki, Hany Ferdinando, Kai Noponen, Tapio Seppänen, Vesa Korhonen, Vesa Kiviniemi, Teemu Myllylä
    | *Authorea*

* `A Retrospective Study on Classifying Gait Signals Using Entropy Measures <https://doi-org.proxy.bnl.lu/10.1109/TENCON58879.2023.10322319>`_
    | Wael Suliman, Vinayakumar Ravi, Tuan D. Pham
    | *IEEE TENCON 2023*

* `Acceleration profiles of adolescent soccer players across a season <https://trace.tennessee.edu/utk_graddiss/8578/>`_
    | Jake Melaro
    | *University of Tennessee (Knoxville) Repository*

* `Entropy-Based Machine Learning Model for Fast Diagnosis and Monitoring of Parkinson’s Disease <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/20/8609>`_
    | Maksim Belyaev, Murugappan Murugappan, Andrei Velichko, Dmitry Korzun
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*
     
* `Linear and Nonlinear Analysis of Trunk Sway Time Series in Office Workers With and Without Chronic Spinal Pain <https://run.unl.pt/bitstream/10362/161075/1/Julio_2023.pdf>`_
    | Afonso Manuel Caetano Julio
    | *Repositorio Universidade Nova de Lisboa*

* `Ensemble Wavelet Decomposition-Based Detection of Mental States Using Electroencephalography Signals  <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/18/7860>`_
    | Smith K. Khare, Varun Bajaj, Nikhil B. Gaikwad, G.R. Sinha
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*

* `A Bio-Inspired Chaos Sensor Model Based on the Perceptron Neural Network: Machine Learning Concept and Application for Computational Neuro-Science <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/16/7137>`_
    | Andrei Velichko, Petr Boriskov,Maksim Belyaev, Vadim Putrolaynen
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*

* `Adazd-Net: Automated adaptive and explainable Alzheimer’s disease detection system using EEG signals <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.knosys.2023.110858>`_
    | Smith K. Khare, U. Rajendra Acharya
    | *Knowledge-Based Systems*

* `Topological entropy bounds multiscale entropy <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.topol.2023.108647>`_
    | Jose S. Cánovas
    | *Topology and its Applications*

* `Normalization for connectivity of brain regions in schizophrenia classification <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10271000/>`_
    | Shunliang Li, Haifeng Wu
    | *IEEE 8th International Conference on Signal and Image Processing (ICSIP)*

* `A Dynamical Systems Approach to Characterizing Brain–Body Interactions during Movement: Challenges, Interpretations, and Recommendations <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/14/6296>`_
    | Derek C. Monroe, Nathaniel T. Berry, Peter C. Fino, Christopher K. Rhea
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*

* `The impact of hardware and design choices on data quality in mouse resting-state functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) <https://escholarship.mcgill.ca/concern/theses/xk81js05z>`_
    | Mila Urosevic
    | *McGill University eScholarship*

* `Approximate Entropy Analysis for Nonlinear Beam Dynamics <https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.17297>`_
    | Yongjun Li    
    | *arXiv*

* `The Influence of Stress Noise and Music Stimulation on the Autonomous Nervous System <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10144438>`_
    | Mariana Jacob Rodrigues, Octavian Postolache, Francisco Cercas
    | *IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and Measurement*

* `Neural Network Entropy (NNetEn): Entropy-Based EEG Signal and Chaotic Time Series Classification, Python Package for NNetEn Calculation <https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4893/16/5/255>`_
    | Andrei Velichko, Maksim Belyaev, Yuriy Izotov, Murugappan Murugappan, Hanif Heidari
    | *Algorithms (MDPI)*

* `Changes in surface electromyography characteristics and foot-tapping rate of force development as measures of spasticity in patients with multiple sclerosis. <https://shareok.org/handle/11244/337631>`_
    | Brian Pribble
    | *University of Oklahoma Library*

* `Analysing Fairness of Privacy-Utility Mobility Models <https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.06469>`_
    | Yuting Zhan, Hamed Haddadi, Afra Mashhadi
    | *arXiv*

* `Early fault diagnosis based on reinforcement learning optimized-SVM model with vibration-monitored signals <https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/08982112.2023.2193255?journalCode=lqen20>`_
    | Wenqin Zhao,Yaqiong Lv, Jialun Liu, Carman K. M. Lee, Lei Tu
    | *Quality Engineering*

* `Fasting and prolonged food restriction differentially affect GH secretion independently of GH receptor signaling in AgRP neurons <https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1111/jne.13254>`_
    | Maria E. de Sousa, Daniela O. Gusmao, Willian O. dos Santos, Henrique T. Moriya, Felipe F. de Lima, Edward O. List, John J. Kopchick, Jose Donato Jr.
    | *Journal of Neuroendocrinology*

* `Non-invasive Waveform Analysis for Emergency Triage via Simulated Hemorrhage: An Experimental Study using Novel Dynamic Lower Body Negative Pressure Model <https://arxiv.org/abs/2303.06064>`_
    | Naimahmed Nesaragi, Lars Øivind Høiseth, Hemin Ali Qadir, Leiv Arne Rosseland, Per Steinar Halvorsen, Ilangko Balasingham
    | *arXiv*

* `Improved Stress Classification Using Automatic Feature Selection from Heart Rate and Respiratory Rate Time Signals <https://www.mdpi.com/2076-3417/13/5/2950>`_
    | Talha Iqbal, Adnan Elahi, William Wijns, Bilal Amin, Atif Shahzad
    | *Applied Sciences (MDPI)*

* `Single-neuron spiking variability in hippocampus dynamically tracks sensory content during memory formation in humans <https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.02.23.529684v1>`_
    | Leonhard Waschke, Fabian Kamp, Evi van den Elzen, Suresh Krishna, Ulman Lindenberger,  Ueli Rutishauser, Douglas D. Garrett
    | *BioRxiv*

* `Complexity and Entropy in Physiological Signals (CEPS): Resonance Breathing Rate Assessed Using Measures of Fractal Dimension, Heart Rate Asymmetry and Permutation Entropy <https://www.mdpi.com/1099-4300/25/2/301>`_
    | David Mayor, Tony Steffert, George Datseris, Andrea Firth, Deepak Panday, Harikala Kandel, Duncan Banks
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*

* `Enhancing classification of preterm-term birth using continuous wavelet transform and entropy-based methods of electrohysterogram signals <https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fendo.2022.1035615/full>`_
    | Héctor Romero-Morales, Jenny Noemí Muñoz-Montes de Oca, Rodrigo Mora-Martínez, Yecid Mina-Paz, José Javier Reyes-Lagos
    | *Frontiers in Endocrinology*

* `Analysis of the complexity and variability of fine and gross motor tasks in fibromyalgia patients: precision and retrospective cross-sectional studies <https://repositorio.ipsantarem.pt/handle/10400.15/4270>`_
    | Nancy Anacleto Brígida
    | *Repositório Científico do Instituto Politécnico de Santarém*

* `Extraction of Information Theory-Based Indices from Fetal-Maternal Heart Rate Simultaneous Signals <https://repositorio-aberto.up.pt/bitstream/10216/152787/2/641576.pdf>`_
    | Ana Filipa Soeiro Gomes
    | *Repositório do Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto*


2022
----

* `The complexity analysis of cerebral oxygen saturation during pneumoperitoneum and Trendelenburg position: a retrospective cohort study <https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s40520-022-02283-w>`_
    | Xiaoxiao Wang, Chang Liu, Kai Zhang, Yunliang Zhang, Yao Yu, Weidong Mi, Hao Li           
    | *Aging Clinical and Experimental Research*

* `Assessing the chaos strength of Taylor approximations of the sine chaotic map <https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11071-022-07929-y>`_     
    | Ioannis Kafetzis, Lazaros Moysis, Christos Volos          
    | *Nonlinear Dynamics*

* `Utility of sample entropy from intraoperative cerebral NIRS oximetry data in the diagnosis of postoperative cognitive improvement <https://doi.org/10.3389/fphys.2022.965768>`_
    | Xiaoxiao Wang, Ran Huo, Wanzhong Yuan, Huishu Yuan, Tao Wang, Nan Li     
    | *Frontiers in Physiology*

* `Entropy Measures of Electroencephalograms towards the Diagnosis of Psychogenic Non-Epileptic Seizures <https://www.mdpi.com/1099-4300/24/10/1348/pdf>`_
    | Chloe Hinchliffe, Mahinda Yogarajah, Samia Elkommos, Hongying Tang, Daniel Abasolo          
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*

* `Application of Two-Dimensional Entropy Measures to Detect the Radiographic Signs of Tooth Resorption and Hypercementosis in an Equine Model <https://www.mdpi.com/2227-9059/10/11/2914>`_
    | Kamil Górski, Marta Borowska, Elżbieta Stefanik, Izabela Polkowska, Bernard Turek, Andrzej Bereznowski, Małgorzata Domino 
    | *Biomedicines (MDPI)*

* `Application of the Two-Dimensional Entropy Measures in the Infrared Thermography-Based Detection of Rider: Horse Bodyweight Ratio in Horseback Riding <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/22/16/6052>`_
    | Małgorzata Domino, Marta Borowska, Łukasz Zdrojkowski, Tomasz Jasiński, Urszula Sikorska, Michał Skibniewski, Małgorzata Maśko
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*

* `What can Entropy Metrics Tell Us About Types of Fixations during Video Viewing? <https://digital.library.txstate.edu/handle/10877/16142>`_
    | K Melnyk, L Friedman, O Komogortsev 
    | *Texas State Digital Library*

* `Dynamical Complexity Response in Traveling Ionospheric Disturbances Across Eastern Africa Sector During Geomagnetic Storms Using Neural Network Entropy <https://doi.org/10.1029/2022ja030630>`_
    | I. A. Oludehinwa, A. Velichko, B. O. Ogunsua, O. I. Olusola, O. O. Odeyemi, A. N. Njah, O. T. Ologun     
    | *Journal of Geophysical Research Space Physics*

* `A Novel Acoustic Method for Cavitation Identification of Propeller <https://doi.org/10.3390/jmse10091225>`_
    | Yang Li, Lilin Cui     
    | *Journal of Marine Science and Engineering*
    
* `Pressure Injury Link to Entropy of Abdominal Temperature <https://doi.org/10.3390/e24081127>`_
    | Nikhil Padhye, Denise Rios, Vaunette Fay, Sandra K Hanneman
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*
    
* `Classification of Electroencephalograms during Mathematical Calculations Using Deep Learning <https://doi.org/10.1109/iri54793.2022.00016>`_
    | Umang Goenka, Param Patil, Kush Gosalia, Aaryan Jagetia
    | *IEEE 23rd International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science (IRI)* , `arXiv <https://doi.org/10.48550/arxiv.2209.00627>`_

* `The Structure of Chaos: An Empirical Comparison of Fractal Physiology Complexity Indices Using NeuroKit2 <https://doi.org/10.3390/e24081036>`_
    | Dominique Makowski, An Shu Te, Tam Pham, Zen Juen Lau, S. H. Annabel Chen
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*

* `Novel techniques for improvement the NNetEn entropy calculation for short and noisy time series <https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.12703>`_    
    | Hanif Heidari, Andrei Velichko
    | *arXiv*

* `Privacy-preserving human mobility and activity modelling <https://spiral.imperial.ac.uk/handle/10044/1/101456>`_
    | Yuting Zhan
    | *Imperial College London Repository*
